name: GTI_ScanPrivateURL
author: Google
description: Get the latest Google Threat Intelligence report for a URL that was privately submitted to Google Threat Intelligence for scanning

configurationItems.name: gti_api_key
configurationItems.description: API key for Google Threat Intelligence.

configurationItems.name: sandboxes
configurationItems.description: Comma-separated list of sandbox environments to use. e.g., chrome_headless_linux,cape_win,zenbox_windows.

configurationItems.name: retention_period_days
configurationItems.description: Number of days the report and URL are retained in VirusTotal (1â€“28). If not set, the group's retention policy is applied.

configurationItems.name: storage_region
configurationItems.description: Region where the URL will be stored. Defaults to the group's private_scanning.storage_region setting. Allowed values: US, CA, EU, GB.

configurationItems.name: interaction_timeout
configurationItems.description: Timeout for interactive sandbox sessions, in seconds. Minimum: 60 (1 minute), Maximum: 1800 (30 minutes).
